__e: We paid lots of money... but it only has 4 strings.
I paid thousands to have that updated. What am I paying Damon for?
Doyle may be even too strong for me.
Though her father paid for a large portion.
Please tell me that he didn't buy you a woman.
So you bought a car and got a job.
Well, it's been a long time since a man bought me a drink. How gallant.
- It was you who took me aside invited me for a drink.
But she left with another guy who bought her a drink.
- Did you pay a man to kill your wife?
You paid a guy to say I'm pretty?
- It was you who took me aside invited me for a drink.
I got what I wanted, so I don't mind.
Oh, you got paid very well for that.
But that doesn't mean he didn't pay for it.
And I want him to be paid for the work that he did.
And did she give you money for your time?
Well, if you're asking if someone was paid to do it, we don't know.
But that doesn't mean he didn't pay for it.
All I want is payment for all the work I've done.
But I did pay for the two of you so two is what I expect.
I don't remember, and she paid in cash, so...
Paid me in cash like always, and that was it.
Even if I wanted to, they paid cash and didn't give me a name.
But don't worry, I'll pay you back.
I got damn well-paid for it too.
Hell, I paid that all at once, don't I?
And he paid the price for it, right? That's why he-- You're wrong.
I've always known what you want, and I've always been the one to pay the price.
But she wasn't the only one who paid the price, was she?
Hey. I know that I'm in your apartment, but I paid this month's rent.
I mean, it's great that she's doing well, but she's not paid her rent for three months now.
He even paid rent the first of the month in person.
But she wasn't the only one who paid the price, was she?
- Okay. I get paid on the 8th. Today's the 6th.
- Yeah, just did, without payin' the...
Oh, yes, I do-- and I've already posted bail for him.
He would have spent the whole night in jail if I had not bailed him out.
Please, you really think you're the first boy I've bailed out of jail?
Okay, what actually happened is no one paid the bill, so I had to.
Cannot believe I did not get the bill paid.
They made friends with the owner while paying the bill.
I know you paid for the room and...
The guys registered in this room didn't tell me nothin'.
Don't tell me she charged you for the night.
